titleStmt.title: A discourse between Cap. Kiffin, and Dr. Chamberlain, about imposition of hands.
titleStmt.author: Chamberlen, Peter, 1601-1683.
Kiffin, William, 1616-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: at the request of a friend.,

notesStmt.note: John Perry, in his Some short animadversions (Wing P1650), ascribes authorship of this to Chamberlen.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
